what kind of file system is the web server on?
if you just type 'mount' does that also return I/O error?
can you su to become root and then try to shutdown -h now ?
You may want to make sure your fstab has this entry for that ext 3 file system of yours: rw,user,noauto,uid=500,gid=500 0  0
that way we know its not mounting as ro only

can you try su instead and then try init again
what you might want to do first is sudo -i so you are root and then 'apachectl stop' to stop the web server
